website_summaries.verdict: Offers the equivalent of adding an upgraded car stereo system with simple mounting solutions for the ATV.
pros: Designed for varied use including ATVs, boats, and snowmobiles
The included amplifier is built right into the body, making it a single unit device you can mount in many spots on the ATV
cons: The larger speakers add extra weight to the device and ATV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speakers! I installed these in a 2016 Polaris ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speakers! I installed these in a 2016 Polaris ranger 900-5 crew. I’m still shocked at how good these speakers sound. I’ve only used an iPhone 7. Works flawless. Very loud and very clear. Bluetooth connects instantly, every time. Draw is around 52 amps.
customer_reviews.author: Earl B. Hickerson

customer_reviews.title: FALLS APART AND SOUND IS DISTORTED
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! When we got it, the 12V adapter was crushed. It took over a week for a replacement to arrive. The first time we went for a ride the thing fell apart! Then about 2 weeks later it came apart again and my husband ended up putting pipe glue on it to get it to stay together. Also, sometimes the sound is so distorted with static you cannot hear the music. This thing comes with a one year warranty and if it keeps tearing up and having distortion, it will be returned way before the year is up!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: ... the price this is a powerful speaker and very easy to connect and use
customer_reviews.text: I agree for the price this is a powerful speaker and very easy to connect and use. One word of caution though... It is NOT Bluetooth ready. It will only work if you connect your device with the provided jack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Warranty Information
customer_reviews.text: Nice, clear, loud sound. Perfect for 4 wheelers. Update: speaker went out, tried to warranty it and they are telling me it is out of the return policy date....warranty says 1 year but they do not honor it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C

customer_reviews.title: Plug N Play!
customer_reviews.text: No frills straight forward set up, out of the box and was playing music within five minutes. Installing it on my UTV took a little creativity as these were a little larger then I was expecting but I made it work. It's rated at 700W peak and I can't find and RMS rating but my guess is about 100 watts RMS, good bass and decent sound quality but for $100 bucks you can't go wrong going to be listening to it with a loud motor next to me so quality wasn't a real concern. I may get a second unit for my Jeep since set up is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and very loud, was able to hear it doing 50mph on my ATV. Straps would not fit my ATV so I had to purchase bigger ones so I did not have to put holes in my box. I have a Polaris XP 1000 Touring with the factory front cargo box. Inline cable sound louder and clearer than the Bluetooth, but still good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: LRG

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sub out on the mountain four or five times now and it seems very sturdy. I ride like a maniac on pretty rough trails that shake and vibrate and jolt pretty hard, but this think is still rockin. I added two additional rubber bungee straps so it is pulled tight and wont bounce off rack. The straps provided are ok for light use but if you ride hard take a little time and secure it tight and you should be very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Norman McPeek

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very bad experience with this product. Just right out the box, it comes with 2 velcro straps and 2 cable ties that are just garbage! Cable ties broke when I was strapping the unit to the front rack. One week later, I was using my ATV and for no reason, the right speaker popped out the tube! We were on a trail with a few friends and that was very embarrassing!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Solis

customer_reviews.title: Talk is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Had alot of trouble with the power in cable. Also did not fair well after extended use, really couldn't withstand consecutive days of vibration. Never exposed this product to inclement weather, and didn't get it wet. It just really failed to live up to the marketing. We went back to a bluetooth sound box. Could of just been ours, but regardless I regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorDan

customer_reviews.title: Eh we will see
customer_reviews.text: Just got it it worked when first plugged in and it was in line with fuse as manual states should be second time trying to turn it on nothing no sound or anything will be returning ordered another one its place we will see but the sound was amazing when it worked the first time plugging it in.
customer_reviews.author: wesley franklin

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. Seams solid. Sounds good but a little hollow/pipe sound. Maybe could used some polyfil. Worth the price! Update:. Just quit working no reply from seller. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Scott Ware

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad For $120
customer_reviews.text: Pretty weak for supposedly 700 watts. My home theater system is 200 watts and it blows this thing away. Sound quality is not horrible, just not as deep, loud, and clear as you would expect. However, and note this...it does pair quickly to a smart phone to play your MP3s, it is portable and interchangeable. Right out of the truck and right into the boat with a 12 volt adapter. It only costs 118.00 delivered to your door. All in all, probably worth about $200...so I will be fair and give credit where it is due. I'd buy it again. -Todd
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Stumbo

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Installed on our 2020 Teryx4, mounted to the rear of the roll cage and all the way to the roof. We can hear these speakers while going full speed with helmets on and volume all the way up. If we aren’t wearing our helmets we don’t need it on full volume they’re plenty loud. Maybe lacking some bass though.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Allen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be designed for rugged outdoors, NOT!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the product while it lasted. Sound quality was amazing!!! Unfortunately, 4 months after purchase, the product just died on. My issue is, it’s a atv designed to survive the ruggedness of outdoors. Trees, water, mud etc. I used mine for non of the above. Mine is clean and still looks brand new, no harsh anything on the product, yet it still didn’t last. It’s been inside the cab of my truck (tractor trailer) for the entirety of its 4 month life span.
customer_reviews.author: Shajuan M.

customer_reviews.title: Quit working trying to contact seller
customer_reviews.text: I love my product, I’m trying to contact seller It absolutely nothing works the red light comes on on the plug but no sound no aux cord nothing I’m getting nothing and it’s upsetting me that they once already lost my order and I get it a month later and then now I’m trying to contact them and I cant
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ahlgrim

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these they look nice and are loud but showed up with poped tweeters. And the price changed in these everyday from $100 to $140 not sure who is in control of that but they need to make up there mind, would definitely go with something else
customer_reviews.author: Jon Batesson

customer_reviews.title: I Am The Party Now
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this product. Mounted on my Can-am Outlander. Incredible sound for this price!!!!! I have buried it in mud and water and then rinsed clean. 2 months in haven't been a problem yet.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lane

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Installed in Polaris razor sound is amazing You can hear it over the engine very well I do not give good reviews and less quality is there for the price you cannot beat it I paid a $109
customer_reviews.author: Kammel

customer_reviews.title: If you don't expect the lows to vibrate you like a sub
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. The volume is ok, the sound is ok. If you don't expect the lows to vibrate you like a sub, and you don't expect the volume to be extreme then its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality; definitely loud enough to pierce through an ATV exhaust + helmet. Rated 4/5 stars because the two 90° pieces are slightly out of alignment from each other, so if laid on a flat surface the unit wobbles like a table with one short leg. I haven’t taken it out on the trails yet, so I can’t comment on the weather proof-ness but everything seems well-sealed. Whomever put mine together just needed to take an extra second or two to make sure the pieces were straight before allowing the glue to set.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: so far it works great and its loud i dont like ghe fact it comes with zip ties to hold in place but overall great buy update been on the atv for awhlie now zip ties broke easy fix been in the water mud sand and clay still working great will buy again
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth stopped working after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this so we could listen to music while riding our atv. Unfortunately, it only worked for a few songs, then it shut off while playing, and never came back on. It still lights up red when plugged into the cigarette lighter, but there is no option to connect to blue tooth. So I'm returning it and having another one sent. Will have to wait over a week to get it, but hopefully it comes sooner. I hope this one works!
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Teryx sxs mounted to roll cage
customer_reviews.text: Plenty loud. Blutooth works well. Downloaded to my phone and EQ AP to tune it to it's full potential. Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and it worked for a week, sat in garage, never got wet and now it doesn’t work. Definitely something wrong with the electrical. First and last sound storm product I will buy. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Not supported by Amazon and cannot contact the seller broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This product sounded fine for the first week or two and then just stopped working the warranty says it's backed by Amazon come to find out Amazon does not back in cannot contact the seller to do any warranty work for it big waste of money I would not buy it I just lost a hundred thirty bucks
customer_reviews.author: Jared T Long

customer_reviews.title: Works good sounds nice.
customer_reviews.text: Cranks right out, I don't see it being 700 real watts but for the money it does sound good and looks slick. Comes with a adapter for the 12v outlet that converts it to directly hooked to the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds ok
customer_reviews.text: Kind of bulky next time I buy bullet speakers that go on handle bars
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic product! Great sound, goes pretty loud too. paired to my phone fast and easy. Will definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: 🎶 🎵 🎶 🎵
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT!! The sound and durability are second to none. Thinking of buying one for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: R. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound, mounter in my polaris ranger. Been a month thru water and mud!!!
customer_reviews.author: Harley H

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: I ride a highlifter 850 mounted speakers on the rear rack the sound quality is great for the cost of this setup it’s way louder than I was expecting using my iPhone with pandora Bluetooth connected with no problems if your looking for cheap system I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Had to repair, but seems good now.
customer_reviews.text: At first power try, it kept cutting out when i turned the volume up. It turned out that one of the brackets that hold the speaker wires on one of of the speakers, had come off and was shorting out against the speaker frame. I had to rivet it back on. Seemed to work fine after that. Sound is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... riding a few times with this but it works wonderfully! Sounds great and you can hear it even ...
customer_reviews.text: Only been out riding a few times with this but it works wonderfully! Sounds great and you can hear it even when your flying down a gravel road! Nice speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The speakers work.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers work great. I have them on my ATV and they sound great, even had them under muddy water and they kept working. The only issue I had is the fuse blue in the 12v adapter.
customer_reviews.author: jwallnj

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. BT works well
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. BT works well. Ended up getting the BTB6 because it fits under the hood of a Honda Pioneer 500.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: BUY THE WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied at first worked good sounded good. then after a few rains it won't come on at all I keep it covered with an atv cover and I have only had it 6 months. Not very water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not very loud and gets distorted or high volume. Other than that so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Chase Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Total junk
customer_reviews.text: This product is total junk. It lasted through 2 rides and never even got wet. I went to take my RZR out for a ride the other day, plugged in the speaker, and it was cracking and sounded terrible. I unplugged it and checked the cables, nothing obviously wrong. I plugged it back in and it wouldn’t even power on. Don’t waste your money on this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: With an easy mod this will out  sound the very expensive units.
customer_reviews.text: for the price it can’t be beat. The sound has an echo from the tubes but easily can remove speakers and add strips of foam rubber tape for a truck cap and a bit of rolled up foam from a camping mat. Sounds better than any other tube I’ve heard.
customer_reviews.author: Kgraham204

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar
customer_reviews.text: For the price and what it's built for it works great. Not to good with the lows at higher volumes but other then that works great.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: This speaker does not have good volumn to it If i was you I would most definitely check around for better quality
customer_reviews.author: Richard king

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! Uses them on his 4 wheeler!
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: Good but blown fuse on delivery
customer_reviews.text: Received the speaker today. Hooked up fine but they sent me a blown fuse so I have to run out and get a new one
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It isn’t as loud as you would think it also isn’t water resistant!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: We put this on our 2019 maverick and it lasted one day... one day.... I mean for 100 bucks I don’t wanna have to keep buying them
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Easy. Quick. Shipper top notch.
customer_reviews.text: Install. What install. Just plug in. Connect bluetooth. And done. Hiccup with carrier but the shipper handles like a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Stumpy24586

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Pull this on my sportsman 700 with modified exhaust and took it to the Mississippi delta for some muddin. Stayed working and loud throughout the rides
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sounding speakers for our Artic Cat. The cat is very lord going down the road and wee cam hear or music perfect. The sound quality is perfect for us. Nice rich sound. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and overall volume of sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and overall volume of sound. Plenty to be heard over an atv or side by side while on a cruise. Feels durable. Doesn’t quite have the level of bass that I was expecting. Bass is a bit more shallow than other brands but for the price it still feels like great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: this thing has tremendous sound
customer_reviews.text: Its a little big, but it sure puts out some great sound. Esp in noisy vehicles
customer_reviews.author: william leider

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, sounds great on my 4 wheeler, no issues A++
customer_reviews.author: bassman

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Good but Mounting Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sound good! However, the straps dod not match. They were 2 different sizes. One strap longer than the other. I had to go purchase hardware to mount on ATV
customer_reviews.author: The Ivys Ranch

customer_reviews.title: sounds great
customer_reviews.text: sounds great. But it is just a little tall for the headlight mounted on the handlebars of our 500 Honda foreman to be able to shine over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 rides
customer_reviews.text: Product was great as soon as I plugged it up took it on two rides now won’t connect to Bluetooth got wet once and then all of a sudden it stopped working completely just before it quit working it would go out at around 25 mph connects to the 12v not the battery....
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality is nice. Seems well built
customer_reviews.text: Received the item in two days. Was double boxed and was well packed. Quality is nice. Seems well built. It had better bass than I expected. If it holds up I will be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with remote
customer_reviews.text: The speaker didn’t come with a remote could we get one I opened. Everything carefully and and went through the boxes and plastic bag and nothing
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Definitely waterproof use it every weekend on the boat have no problem hearing it sounds great and easy to mount and move very portable
customer_reviews.author: Logan Bogart

customer_reviews.title: It's a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I took it out of the box, it broke. The speaker came unplugged from the tube and it wouldn't play music. Total waste of money! On top of that, Amazon nor the manufacturer would give me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought in late April and only had it playing for a few months UNTIL the mother board blew 😑 Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Allen

customer_reviews.title: QUIT WORKING AFTER A SHORT TIME
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKED FINE WHILE IT LASTED BUT IT DID NOT LAST LONG FOR THE MONEY IT ONLY LASTED A COUPLE MONTHS DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: michelle HAIRE

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is advertised. Very easy to install. Sound quality is very good unless it’s turned all the way up. Otherwise it’s perfect for riding.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!!!! It should be way more expensive than it is because of the sound quality you are getting!!! Absolutely love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Treykevian Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth issues
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth stopped working after using 2 times Haven't used it to many times due to no Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Lovett

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for the price. Try this on your ATV. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brad moore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. TOO big for ATV
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this speaker so far. Sounds great on an atv. But this thing is HUGE. 6.5 inch is enough size for a full size atv. 8 inch model is massive.
customer_reviews.author: JMiller

customer_reviews.title: Speakers blow out after one ride
customer_reviews.text: NOT WORTH THE MONEY. Speaker quality is bad and one blew out after the first ride at half volume
customer_reviews.author: Xx

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: sounded great but only Worked 3 days on the atv then no sound
customer_reviews.author: Christopher leininger

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing it is very tuff. And sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect puts a whole new vibe when I ride my four wheeler now. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Quality is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great affordable price and an awesome way to add music to any atv/utv bluetooth easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Glidewell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great being it's price. loud! Way more then I expect. Clear sound definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ty Aquilino

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my father and he absolutely loves it! The sound can get crazy loud, so is perfect for outdoor riding. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Pittman

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: broke after two months amazon wouldnt take or exchange it
customer_reviews.author: waymond moore

customer_reviews.title: Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound the straps are a little flimsy. I purchased a few flexible cords works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: April Meggs McDougle

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! Quit working in less than a month. Never been abused or in weather
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Works great, waterproof, Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for almost a year now, works great!! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommmend
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Easy to install. Worked perfectly four our 2018 and 2017 Polaris Atvs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gasiorek

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and it was delivered unexpectedly quick
customer_reviews.text: It was worth the price. Sounds great and it was delivered unexpectedly quick. Very happy with the whole transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A.

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Plug in play simple to use sounds good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That u can return it with no problem 👍
customer_reviews.text: All I to say is that it works it loud and clear the bass is 👌👌👌👌.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth will not connect
customer_reviews.text: Might be great if the Bluetooth actually connected to anybody’s phone!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound system
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Well built for rough riding. My 15 year old son has certainly tested its durability.
customer_reviews.author: tonya walker

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and bass for a atv or utv
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and installed this unit on my utv side by side and the first day on the trail, one complete side for the speakers exhibited a short. Unfortunately, I threw away the packaging and am stuck with a defective unit, but at least learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Is a really big unit but its great just to have some loud tunes while running the buggy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very loud and very tough
customer_reviews.text: Great product.Very loud and very tough.I will recommend this speaker to anyone.Going to buy another one for my sons four wheeler .Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The straps that come with it suck. And now they are not working after only 1 ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great when it's working
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great when it's working. Problem is 80% of the time it doesn't work. Blue tooth or hard wired. Both cut out and randomly stop for anywhere from a few seconds to weeks on out. I got this back in July and it's October now. Hasn't worked for the last 3 weeks. I would consider another unit. I will say when this thing is working it sounds great and I couldn't be happier with it.....when it's running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for his 4-wheeler. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds horrible
customer_reviews.text: I have adjusted the equalizer, no matter the settings it sounds muffled as if the tweeters are not working at all. Very disappointed, my pyle 6.5" sounded fine thought this was a upgrade... I will contact sound storm and see if it's defective and post back witt a update.
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: For the money it really isn’t bad.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these aren’t bad, 8” have a little bass kick to them, by brute is a little loud but you can still hear the music just not as loud. Good for tailgates. Make sure you use the straps and zip ties or it’ll move around. All 4 ties used and it doesn’t budge.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s loud, a little staticky and the quick connect part to the battery constantly comes loose making music stop and fell apart after 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: A&J🤑

customer_reviews.title: The only speakers I haven't broken
customer_reviews.text: you name it and I've managed to break them... with little to no effort at all despite my every attempt to coddle the devices. So far these have survived. I ride in creeks so my atv stays in the water. I wished they were a bit louder but I'll take it over durability any day.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers!
customer_reviews.text: My buddy got this and I couldn’t believe how great they are. Was too afraid to buy speakers for my atv thinking I’d never hear the music. Now I got these and could be happier
customer_reviews.author: livethatlife365

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks in, great speaker on my Honda pioneer 1000-5. Simple to pair and sounds great. Not gonna hit the base to hard but still has a good full sound for the money well worth the try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the sound
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked awesome but it didn’t fit well in Yamaha Wolverine 4x at all. Had to return but I’d totally recommend if this fits your rig.
customer_reviews.author: Mailman16T

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: It is very loud, and I love it. The bluetooth, despite other reviews works great. I have used it at Mud nationals, and multiple trail rides now. Very happy, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good sound but could go louder in a moving quad
customer_reviews.text: good sound but could go louder in a moving quad. The attachments could use work[ 2 cloth straps and 2 large wire ties } the ties are almost useless and the straps work poorly. you may need to find better way to attach i did.
customer_reviews.author: tmed007

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the loudest cell phone speaker you'll find...I really didn't want to payout hundred of dollars for a decent car audio system for my suv. Set this unit on the back seats, hooked it up to a small cheap tablet just for music & GPS... No problems so far, nice & loud, is lackings mids however as started in other reviews. Using Bluetooth connection no cords, works great...mines a good one, they sell lemons every day, get a bad one return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan king

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected but sounds great! Bought it as a gift and it was a huge success!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ozburn

product_meta.title: Sound Storm Laboratories BTB8 ATV UTV Weatherproof Sound System - 8 Inch Speakers, 1 Inch Tweeters, Amplified, Bluetooth, Aux-In, Easy Installation for 12 Volt Vehicles
product_meta.description:
Style:700 Watt 8" Speakers| Pattern Name:SpeakersEnjoy the great outdoors with your favorite tunes while riding your ATV, tailgating or camping with the SSL BTB8 BoomTube Weatherproof Powersports Plug & Play System. Compatible with any 12V power source, this unit features high quality sound with the 700 Watt Max Class D Power Amp, 8" Marine Speakers and 1" Tweeters. Hook the Audio Output of your Smartphone or MP3 Player to the Auxiliary Input to max out your music options. Bluetooth Audio Streaming lets you wirelessly play your favorite music apps like Spotify and Pandora. Control it all with your Smartphone or MP3 Player. The BTB8 is Weatherproof to help provide protection against the elements. Feel your music vibes wherever you go with the SSL BTB8. 

For further product details, please scroll down.
feature_bullets: BLUETOOTH: Bluetooth Audio Streaming lets you play and control music and apps like Spotify / Pandora wirelessly via the Bluetooth Remote Control
AUXILIARY INPUT: 3.5 mm aux-in compatible with audio output of iPod / iPhone, smartphones and MP3 players
WEATHERPROOF: The BTB8 has been outfitted with the latest weatherproofing techniques for protection against the elements
AMPLIFIED: The speakers and tweeters are powered by a high performance built-In 700 watt class D amplifier
EASY SETUP: Bring power to the BTB8 in just seconds by plugging in the cigarette lighter power cord; Frequency Response - 45Hz - 25kHz
CONTENTS: BTB8 All-Terrain speaker system, 2 mounting straps, 2 nylon zip straps, power accessory (Cigarette) extension adaptor, user manual, warranty card

WARRANTY: Sound Storm provides a powerful 3 year Platinum Online Dealer Warranty so long as the purchase is made through Amazon.com. We strongly encourage professional installation of this product to ensure proper and safe functionality
